title: Executive Order 5076-Designating Helen V. McLeod to Sign the Pressident's Name to Land Patents During the Absence of the Clerk
content: Mrs. Helen V. McLeod, of the General Land Office, Department of the Interior, is hereby designated to sign my name to patents during the absence of the clerk regularly designated for that purpose.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5076-Designating Helen V. McLeod to Sign the Pressident's Name to Land Patents During the Absence of the Clerk Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360793
